data.name: LoanOfferLoanApplicationApproved
data.value: Your loan application with LightStream has been approved!

data.name: LoanOfferLoanApplicationApprovedParagraph2
data.value: To accept the loan terms below simply (1) Proceed to Loan Agreement to review and electronically sign your loan agreement; (2) go to Account Set Up and provide us with your preferences - funding date, banking information, monthly payment date, etc. and; (3) complete the final verification process.

data.name: LoanOfferLoanTermsApprovedParagraph2
data.value: To begin the funding process, please Proceed to Loan Agreement.

data.name: LoanOfferLoanApplicationApprovedParagraph3
data.value: You may fund your loan the same day you complete the above process, if that day is a banking business day, and the final verification process is completed by {0}. Otherwise, feel free to set-up your loan for funding at anytime, for any available day.

data.name: PreFundingInfo_LoanPurpose_Message
data.value:
IMPORTANT!

Do NOT have LightStream listed as a lienholder on your vehicle title or loss payee on your insurance policy. If {0} insurance company inquires, just tell them that you did NOT use secured financing. This will save each of us paperwork hassles in the future. Thanks!

data.name: OptOutOfSurveys

data.name: OptInToTestimonialPgm
data.value: Your participation in our customer testimonial is very much appreciated.

data.name: DeclineNoticeNotYetAvailable
data.value: Your decline notice is not yet available, please try again in a few minutes.

data.name: AutoPayAuthorizationInd
data.value: I hereby authorize [LenderName], its successors and assigns, to initiate withdrawals for monies payable for loan agreement referenced above to [LenderName]. Such withdrawals shall be made from the above referenced Payment Account or such other account that I designate in the future to which I am a signatory. I understand that this authorization will remain in effect until I notify [LenderName] to cancel it by emailing [EmailAddress] and [LenderName] is given a reasonable time to effect such cancellation. I understand that I may stop any payment by notifying [LenderName] or the financial institution holding my account 3 or more business days before my account is to be charged. If your selected Payment Date is not a banking business day, or is in a month with fewer days, the payment will be on the next business day.

data.name: AutoPayAuthorizationJoint
data.value: We hereby authorize [LenderName], its successors and assigns, to initiate withdrawals for monies payable for loan agreement referenced above to [LenderName]. Such withdrawals shall be made from the above referenced Payment Account or such other account that we designate in the future to which one or both or us are a signatory. We understand that this authorization will remain in effect until we notify [LenderName] to cancel it by emailing [EmailAddress] and [LenderName] is given a reasonable time to effect such cancellation. We understand that I may stop any payment by notifying [LenderName] or the financial institution holding my account 3 or more business days before my account is to be charged. If your selected Payment Date is not a banking business day, or is in a month with fewer days, the payment will be on the next business day.

data.name: ACHPaymentInvoiceAuthorizationInd
data.value: I hereby authorize [LenderName], its successors and assigns, to initiate a withdrawal for monies payable for the loan agreement referenced above to [LenderName]. The withdrawal shall be made from the above referenced Payment Account. I understand that this authorization is solely for this single transaction. I understand that I may stop any payment by notifying [LenderName] or the financial institution holding my account 3 or more business days before my account is to be charged. If your selected Payment Date is not a banking business day, or is in a month with fewer days, the payment will be on the next business day.

data.name: ACHPaymentInvoiceAuthorizationJoint
data.value: We hereby authorize [LenderName], its successors and assigns, to initiate a withdrawal for monies payable for the loan agreement referenced above to [LenderName]. The withdrawal shall be made from the above referenced Payment Account. We understand that this authorization is solely for this single transaction. We understand that we may stop any payment by notifying [LenderName] or the financial institution holding my account 3 or more business days before our account is to be charged. If your selected Payment Date is not a banking business day, or is in a month with fewer days, the payment will be on the next business day.

data.name: ApplicationDisclosure_California
data.value: Notice to California Residents: California Law (Cal Civ Code § 1812.30) requires that you be informed that if you are married, you may apply for a separate account.

data.name: ApplicationDisclosure_Ohio
data.value: Notice to Ohio Residents: The Ohio laws against discrimination require that all creditors make credit equally available to all creditworthy customers, and that credit reporting agencies maintain separate credit histories on each individual upon request. The Ohio Civil Rights Commission administers compliance with this law.

data.name: ApplicationDisclosure_Vermont
data.value: Notice to Vermont Residents: Lender is engaged in loan production.

data.name: ApplicationDisclosure_Wisconsin
data.value: Married Wisconsin Residents: No provision of any marital property agreement, any unilateral statement under Wisconsin Stat. § 766.59 or a court decree under Wisconsin Stat. § 766.70 applied to marital property adversely affects our interest unless you furnish a copy of the agreement, statement or court decree to us or we have actual knowledge of such adverse provision before credit is granted. If you are making this application individually and not jointly with your spouse, you understand that Wisconsin law requires that your spouse be given notice of this credit obligation.

data.name: FloridaDocStampDisclosure
data.value: A Florida documentary stamp tax which we are required to collect and transmit to the State of Florida on your behalf, in the amount of {1:C}, will be added to your loan amount and will slightly increase the monthly payment. Stamp tax is not included when determining loan interest rate. You will see this in the Disclosures section of your loan agreement.

data.name: FloridaDocStampAppDisclosure
data.value: A Florida documentary stamp tax in the amount of {1:C} will be added to your loan amount then transmitted for payment on your behalf. Stamp tax is not included when determining loan interest rate.

data.name: LoanTerms_ChangeTerms
data.value: Your loan application has been approved for the loan terms below. You may also request a change to these loan terms by submitting your request below.

data.name: LoanTerms_ChangeTerms_Prefunding
data.value: Your loan application has been approved for the loan terms below. You may also request a change to these loan terms by submitting your request below.

data.name: LoanTerms_Approved_ForMaxAmount
data.value: Your loan application has been approved for the maximum loan amount. You may request a lower amount, change your term, or form of payment.

data.name: LoanTerms_Current_Below_Counter
data.value: Your loan application has been approved for the maximum loan amount of {0}. You may request a loan amount equal to or less than this amount, change your term, or form of payment.

data.name: LoanTerms_Approved_SecuredAuto
data.value: Your loan application has been approved for the loan terms below. You may also request a change to these loan terms by submitting your request below.

data.name: DeclineReferralOptIn
data.value:
In the event that we are unable to approve your loan request, please check this box if you would like us to share your application information with third parties to assist you in getting a loan. By checking this box, you understand we may receive a fee and agree:
1. The third parties can contact you by phone and/or email;
2. The Statement on the Use of Electronic Records, and the consents and notices below, apply to any third party to which we refer you;
3. You are authorizing the third parties to pull your credit report to determine if you qualify; and
4. They may also share your information with other third parties for the purpose of getting a loan

data.name: AddCoApplicantNewUserIdReminder
data.value: As a reminder, when you submitted a joint application, you created a new User ID. Please use the new User ID and password to access the joint application.

data.name: GenericError
data.value: We are sorry but an error has occurred and we are unable to process your request. Please try again.

data.name: UnexpectedStatusError
data.value: The application is no longer in the expected status. Please log in again to continue.
